DocAttribute.Name: RelatingMaterial
DocAttribute.Documentation: Material definition (either a single material, a list of materials, or a set of material layers) assigned to the elements.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The material information must not be associated to a substraction feature (such as an opening) or to a virtual element.
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* SELF\IfcRelAssociates.RelatedObjects | ('IFCPRODUCTEXTENSION.IFCFEATUREELEMENTSUBTRACTION' IN TYPEOF(temp)) OR ('IFCPRODUCTEXTENSION.IFCVIRTUALELEMENT' IN TYPEOF(temp)) )) = 0

DocWhereRule.Name: WR22
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The material information, using _IfcMaterialSelect_ should be associated to a product occurrence or an product type.
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* SELF\IfcRelAssociates.RelatedObjects | (NOT('IFCKERNEL.IFCPRODUCT' IN TYPEOF(temp)) AND NOT('IFCKERNEL.IFCTYPEPRODUCT' IN TYPEOF(temp))) )) = 0
